name: 5-Minute Salsa
description: Have you ever found that you are making dinner and you realize you don't have salsa? In a Mexican household this could almost be considered a sin. This is where this salsa comes in. It takes 5 minutes to make, no really, 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the tomatoes, using the large holes on your grater, into a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Grate the tomatoes, using the large holes on your grater, into a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the serranos into the same bowl using the small holes in the grater. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Grate the serranos into the same bowl using the small holes in the grater. Mix well.
